DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study evaluate safety effectiveness In-Space compare X STOP Interspinous Process Distraction ( IPD ) device ( `` X STOP '' ) treatment patient experience intermittent neurogenic claudication secondary moderate degenerative lumbar stenosis one two lumbar level .
DOC.brief_title: A Study In-Space Device Treatment Moderate Spinal Stenosis
DOC.criteria: ≥ 50 year age Leg/buttock/groin pain , without back pain , completely relieve flexion sit chair . Zurich Claudication Questionnaire Score ≥ 2.0 , Neurogenic intermittent claudication secondary moderate lumbar spinal stenosis Has complete least 6 month conservative therapy Axial back pain without leg/buttock/groin pain Has prior lumbar spine surgery level Significant scoliosis , define Cobb angle > 10° Spondylolisthesis > Grade 1 isthmic spondylolisthesis affect level Osteoporosis Morbid obesity , define BMI > 40 kg/m2
